languages.text: "Столь дерзкое суждение о вышестоящем из уст простолюдин... Прошу прощения, я хотела сказать, что поражена смелостью вашей мысли".
"Such harsh judgement of a superior from the insolent mouth of a common— I beg your pardon, what I meant to say was I am amazed at the boldness of your thought."
languages.original_text: "Столь дерзкое суждение о вышестоящем из уст простолюдин... Прошу прощения, я хотела сказать, что поражена смелостью вашей мысли".

traits.locale_text: "Such harsh judgement of a superior from the insolent mouth of a common— I beg your pardon, what I meant to say was I am amazed at the boldness of your thought."
"Such harsh judgement of a superior from the insolent mouth of a common— I beg your pardon, what I meant to say was I am amazed at the boldness of your thought."
"Such harsh judgement of a superior from the insolent mouth of a common— I beg your pardon, what I meant to say was I am amazed at the boldness of your thought."
"Such harsh judgement of a superior from the insolent mouth of a common— I beg your pardon, what I meant to say was I am amazed at the boldness of your thought."
"Such harsh judgement of a superior from the insolent mouth of a common— I beg your pardon, what I meant to say was I am amazed at the boldness of your thought."

languages.text: "Ein solch harsches Urteil über einen Vorgesetzten aus dem dreisten Maul des Pöbels — verzeiht, ich wollte sagen, dass mich die Kühnheit Eurer Gedanken erstaunt!"
languages.original_text: "Such harsh judgement of a superior from the insolent mouth of a common— I beg your pardon, what I meant to say was I am amazed at the boldness of your thought."

traits.locale_text: "Ein solch harsches Urteil über einen Vorgesetzten aus dem dreisten Maul des Pöbels — verzeiht, ich wollte sagen, dass mich die Kühnheit Eurer Gedanken erstaunt!"

languages.text: « C'est un jugement bien dur à porter sur un supérieur, venant d'une impudente roturière... Pardon, je voulais juste vous dire à quel point votre audace me surprend. »
languages.original_text: "Such harsh judgement of a superior from the insolent mouth of a common— I beg your pardon, what I meant to say was I am amazed at the boldness of your thought."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un jugement bien dur à porter sur un supérieur, venant d'une impudente roturière... Pardon, je voulais juste vous dire à quel point votre audace me surprend. »

languages.text: «Un juicio muy duro de un superior por parte de una plebeya insolen... lo siento, solo quería decir que me impresiona la audacia de sus pensamientos».
languages.original_text: "Such harsh judgement of a superior from the insolent mouth of a common— I beg your pardon, what I meant to say was I am amazed at the boldness of your thought."

traits.locale_text: «Un juicio muy duro de un superior por parte de una plebeya insolen... lo siento, solo quería decir que me impresiona la audacia de sus pensamientos».

languages.text: 「平民の横柄な口から、目上の人に対するそのような辛辣な判断を…失礼しました。私が言いたかったのは、あなたの大胆な考え方に驚いた、ということです」
languages.original_text: "Such harsh judgement of a superior from the insolent mouth of a common— I beg your pardon, what I meant to say was I am amazed at the boldness of your thought."

traits.locale_text: 「平民の横柄な口から、目上の人に対するそのような辛辣な判断を…失礼しました。私が言いたかったのは、あなたの大胆な考え方に驚いた、ということです」

languages.text: “没想到，能从一介贫民的傲慢之口中听到对掌权者如此严厉的评价……我很抱歉，我的意思是说，你大胆的想法让我诧异不已。”
languages.original_text: "Such harsh judgement of a superior from the insolent mouth of a common— I beg your pardon, what I meant to say was I am amazed at the boldness of your thought."

traits.locale_text: “没想到，能从一介贫民的傲慢之口中听到对掌权者如此严厉的评价……我很抱歉，我的意思是说，你大胆的想法让我诧异不已。”

languages.original_text: "Such harsh judgement of a superior from the insolent mouth of a common— I beg your pardon, what I meant to say was I am amazed at the boldness of your thought."

languages.text: "Yüksek makamdaki birinin sıradan bir yurttaşın küstah diliyle konuşarak böylesine sert bir yorum yapması... Özürlerimi sunuyorum. Düşüncenin cesareti karşısında hayranlığa kapıldığımı söylemeye çalışmıştım."
languages.original_text: "Such harsh judgement of a superior from the insolent mouth of a common— I beg your pardon, what I meant to say was I am amazed at the boldness of your thought."
